headline: Are consumer staples stocks still worth investing in?
summary: Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Brooke DiPalma and Slatestone Wealth chief market strategist Kenny Polcari come on Opening Bid to assess the state of the US consumer and whether the consumer staples (XLP) category still offers investors stability. Also be sure to catch Yahoo Finance Executive Editor Brian Sozzi's full interview with Procter & Gamble (PG) CFO Andre Schulten after the company released fourth quarter earnings results. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out moreÂ Opening Bid.

headline: McCormick Is No Longer Overvalued
summary: McCormick & Company, Incorporated is fairly valued with 2026 growth targets, Mexico gains, and a CCI/ERP/dividend focus. Read why MKC stock is a hold.
